channel.title: New to coding.. please help add new area
channel.description:
Hey guys.. Riight as ive said befour im brand new to coding but everyone keeps sending me confusing stuff.
Im sorry but everyone has to start somewhere to learn right? I want to start off by learning how to add a portal and link it to a co-ord and then add stuff like shops.. rocks to mine.. alters.. stall for theive etc, so i basically want to make a good training area.
Any help that you can give will be great. :) Please dont flame this cos yes im new to this but you were all her once, if u dont wanna help then dont post.. no need for flaming.
Thanks, Jake :D

item.title: New to coding.. please help add new area
item.dc:creator: @jake_93 jake_93
item.description:
@jake_93 wrote:

where about in client.java do i add this?
“case 7352: // Portal At Front.
teleportToX = 2502;
teleportToY = 3011;
sendMessage(“You teleport to the Enchanted Minigame.”);
break;”
???

Read full topic
item.source: New to coding.. please help add new area

item.title: New to coding.. please help add new area
item.dc:creator: @xxDiluted2xx xxDiluted2xx
item.description:
@xxDiluted2xx wrote:

There are tutorials on how to add objects. To start, search public void newObject in client.java folder. It should look like this –

        makeGlobalObject(2859, 9881, 2213, 0, 10); // bank

This is known as a global object, it allows you to add ‘Objects’. Okay, first off. The first 2 set of numbers is the coords. That allows you to place it where you want it. The 3rd set of numbers, is the object ID. What I gave you was a bank ID. (Open) the next number is the direction, it tells you which way it is facing. It basicly goes from -2 to 2. And the word at the end, is the description. Also like… A reminder.

Now… A portal is a little difficult. I will use this for example.

case 7352: // Portal At Front. teleportToX = 2502; teleportToY = 3011; sendMessage("You teleport to the Enchanted Minigame."); break;

That is an example of a portal. This is probably firstly used in Allstar base. The enchanted mini. Okay, to start off. This –

        case 7352:

Is the ID. Object id, which is a portal. So now the rest –

teleportToX = 2502; teleportToY = 3011;

That is where it will teleport you to. X and Y coords. Ofcourse, now for this step.

sendMessage("You teleport to the Enchanted Minigame.");

That is the message it will send you when you enter. So pretty easy eh? Now, to ADD the portal to where ever you want it. Use the Global Object method I gave you. Just replace the coords, and the object ID. Good luck, hope this helped.

Read full topic
